tooltip的显示和隐藏只能派发事件吧？如果有获取tooltip的显示和隐藏事件就好办，不然，就算你通过click事件去改变x轴的颜色，你却监听不到tooltip隐藏事件，然而就不能把原来高亮的x轴颜色改回来
Seem to have `SyntaxError: Unexpected token :`. Please check by yourself.

因为你是在 xy 轴都是数值轴的坐标系里放柱状图，而柱状图的中间用来表示其对应的数字，而不是左侧，因此如果第一个数据 x 值是 0 的话，意味着第一个柱子的中间是 0，也就是 y 轴的位置。
这种需求本来就不太常见（可能在某些场景下是合理的），通常柱状图都是横轴是类目轴（category），纵轴是数值轴。

@Ovilia   emphasis 样式设为默认样式 ,  mouseover等鼠标还是手型， 所以问下是否有控制鼠标的选项
@Ovilia 你去看下我给的地址的官网上的写法，我一模一样 复制过来的，如果你说option后面不能这样写那就是官网就错了
已经解决了，是ajax的作用域出现了问题，在这里我们不能使用$.get(uri,function(data){})的方式使用数据，而应该使用$.get(uri).then(res =>{})的方式来使用数据
官网哪里写 `option = { this.chartColumn` 了？自己好好理解下吧。
@Ovilia 请看其他信息里面，那个option = {}是写这个issue的时候自动出来的，没注意到
@Ovilia 而且这里并不是该问题的实际所在
@sunchenguang 没有计划支持甘特图，自己可以通过这种方式使用：http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=bar-waterfall2 当然，如果给我们提 PR 的话，是非常欢迎的~
http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-graph.cursor 有是有，但是只能控制整体的，不能控制单个的。
不是 bug，你是用了 stack，stack 表示堆积，所以蓝色的位置表示两个系列之和。如果不需要，去掉 stack。
@Ovilia 多谢，部分不可点击通过 绑定事件dispatchAction 的 mapUnSelect 迂回解决了， 鼠标通过 event.target 解决了

Also, I believe this is the same issue. 

https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/issues/7002

@rkellermeyer I was able to reproduce this in the sandbox and filed this issue with a little more detail: https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/issues/8994

FWIW, a workaround is to add `display:none` to the `<defs>` element in the SVG (if using SVG). Otherwise, removing animation (`animation: false`) in the chart options will also work.

使用堆叠实现了，谢谢老哥

> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.

If `notMerge` is set, new data will not be compared to the previous data. Technically speaking, this saves the comparing time, so it may be quicker than merge. But more importantly, the animation from the changes will not be available if `notMerge`.
I'd suggest figure out the real problem rather then use `notMerge`. But if it works for you, that's also OK.

I implemented an example in codepen where the problem is seen if notMerge is not set.

The content is composed of the chart for "option1" and the chart for option2"... You can see that they both are drawn correctly.
Then if you click the button at the top left corner, the option for chart 1 will be changed to option2, the error is then thrown as you will see.

#8994 has more detailed information for this issue. Close for duplicate.

Hi @jas0ncn . Can you provide a further explanation of how this `align` works? For example, if it is set to be `'left'`, and parent level is `n`, will its child be place at `n + 1` position? Or can it set to be at `leafN - x` position, where `leafN` is the level of leaves and `x` can be configured?
Not necessary change. Sorry I have to close this.

@cuijian-dexter Hi @cuijian-dexter , I think this feature is very useful although we have to discuss it in details. But first of all, could you please change the title and comments into English so that more community members can understand? Thanks!
@Ovilia  ok,I'll change it right away

hi @jas0ncn, I'm the author of Sankey diagram, thank you for your PR.  
Many people have given me feedback before you mentioned the problem. I tried to add a  `align`  configuration item like you, like D3, but I found that this does not solve the fundamental problem, because if the user wants a node to display at a specific layer in the middle, there is no way to satisfy it. So I am going to add a new layout, set up a  `layer`  configuration item, and the user specifies the nodes for each layer.  Thanks again!

Best wishes,
Deqing
@deqingli Thanks reply! I agree with you, is there a timetable for implementing `layer`?
Thanks! waiting for it 👍

You need to remove the pie-related code from the PR. Undo the changes in pie chart; commit; pull request.
Here's how to open another PR on GitHub: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8450036/how-to-open-multiple-pull-requests-on-github You can also wait for the PR to be closed and then add a new PR.
